translations: n.[摄]底片；负数；负面事物（negative 的复数形式）
v.否定；反对；消除（negative 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: 负面影响；负效应；负磁力效应
不利影响；消极作用；负影响
负温度，负绝对温度；零下温度
adj. 革兰氏阴性的；革兰氏〔染色）阴性的

sentences.sentence: In the past we have heard only negatives when it came to following a healthy diet.
sentences.translation: 过去一谈到遵循健康饮食我们就只听到否定的意见。

sentences.sentence: Although the "ne" in negatives should always be written, it is very rarely used in informal speech.
sentences.translation: 尽管“ne”在否定式中应总被书写，在非正式口语中却很少被用到。

sentences.sentence: The percentage of false negatives generated by the cancer test is of great concern.
sentences.translation: 癌症检查的结果中，假阴性占一定比例的现象受到极大关注。
